item.description: Hi! It’s Anton here and I’m the author of datastrophic.io - my personal blog. I’m a technical leader and a software engineer specializing on distributed systems, data platforms, and AI infrastructure. So what does datastrophic mean at all? The name originates from circa 2015 when I was helping startups to design their in-house data platforms and we talked a lot about various issues related but not limited to data loss, consistency, delivery semantics, idempotent writes, backups etc.
